name: Checkbox.Indicator

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: 是否对此组件使用渲染委派。

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: 正在呈现的基础 DOM 元素。您可以绑定到此元素以编程方式与元素进行交互。

description: A component which passes isChecked and isIndeterminate slot props to its children. This is useful for rendering the checkbox's indicator icon depending on its state.

slots.name: isChecked
slots.description: Whether or not the checkbox is checked.

slots.name: isIndeterminate
slots.description: Whether or not the checkbox is indeterminate.

slots.name: attrs
slots.description: Additional attributes to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: 如果使用带有委托的 asChild 属性，则应用于元素的其他属性。
